      • getShellCommand

        public java.lang.String getShellCommand()
        Returns:
        shell command name - this should (though if improperly configured, cannot be guaranteed to) be a valid command to pass as the first argument to the system(OutputStream, OutputStream, InputStream, String...) method if you want to invoke the system's currently defined command shell; will be null if shell command name cannot be determined for current environment

      • abortWait

        public void abortWait()
        Sets the flag that will cause "waits" done by the system(OutputStream, OutputStream, InputStream, String...) call (and its derivatives) to abort.

      • system

        public int system(java.lang.String... args)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Same as system(OutputStream, OutputStream, InputStream, String...) but passes nulls for selecting default streams for stdout, stderr and stdin
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        system(OutputStream, OutputStream, InputStream, String...)

      • system

        public int system(java.io.OutputStream out,
                  java.io.OutputStream err,
                  java.io.InputStream in,
                  java.lang.String... args)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Execute system command; note this command will block until the specified system command / process (and any children it creates) has (have) terminated.
        Parameters:
        out - output stream to which processes "stdout" will be routed; if null is passed, will use System.out
        err - output stream to which processes "stderr" will be routed if null is passed, will use System.err
        in - input stream from which processes "stdin" will be routed if null is passed, will use System.in
        args - array of system command & its arguments (must not be null and length of this array must be greater than zero)
        Returns:
        return code from system command
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - unhandled exception generated while executing method, or invalid argument(s) were passed to it
        java.lang.NullPointerException - args parameter passed was null or contained null value(s)
